column1: Little Goat Diner////I got the veggie quesadilla
column2: hold the smoked blueberries.   Smoked anything tastes like meat and definitely not what I want.  It was good
column3: but the cheese wasn't as melted as it should have been
column4: and was a tad too oily.  It came with eggplant inside
column5: and radishes on top.  Some bites of eggplant didn't taste fully cooked.  I also had a side of the cheesy hash browns.  They were good
